title: Event Vendor Aggregator
description: A platform that connects event vendors (wedding, corporate, and birthday planners) with consumers, offering booking and rating functionality.

title: Task Management App
description: A full-stack task manager that allows users to create, update, and delete tasks with real-time updates using WebSockets.

title: Next.js E-commerce Store
description: An e-commerce store built with Next.js, featuring product filtering, authentication, and Stripe payment integration.
